ntfy.description: Configures the ntfy.sh integration, specifying the target topic and optional server URL.

ntfy.enabled.description: Toggles ntfy.sh push notifications on or off.

ntfy.topic.description: Sets the topic name where notifications will be published. This should be kept secret if using the public instance.

ntfy.url.description: Specifies a custom ntfy server URL. Defaults to 'https://ntfy.sh' if not provided.

system.levels.description: Defines the severity levels that will trigger a desktop notification. Common values include "info", "warning", and "error".
